translations: 粗糙地；天然地；粗鲁地；不成熟地

sentences.sentence: He hated it when she spoke so crudely.
sentences.translation: 他讨厌她说话那么粗鲁。

sentences.sentence: The donors can be split – a little crudely – into two groups.
sentences.translation: 捐献者们可以分成–大致地–两个组。

sentences.sentence: One strut had fractured and been crudely repaired in several places.
sentences.translation: 一根支柱断裂了，好几处已做了粗略修补。
